item.title: Automatic Node.js Version Switching
item.description: When working on multiple Node.js projects it is important to configure your development environment to automatically switch to right node version for a particular project. You can automate this task on many different ways. I opted for using using a module called avn that works both with nvm and n for automatic Node.js version switching.
